name: Ivan Poon
body:
## Welcome to Ivan's GitHub Page This page contains some of the past projects I have contributed to, as well as some info about my current work/status. ### Projects #### In Progress: * [Squigle] (#!): A one-stop, fully featured scheduling system. More details coming soon..! #### Leading: * [Teammates] (http://teammatesv4.appspot.com/about.html): A robust peer evaluation platform for academic team projects. * [Quotiq] (http://quotiq.net/): A quote+comment sharing social media platform powered by a Chrome extension. #### Previously Led: * [ReallyCheap](http://mobileapp-env-rw43qpu9wb.elasticbeanstalk.com): A location-based mobile web application for shoppers and deal hunters. * [PowerWiFlyII](https://github.com/RavenXce/PowerWiFlyII): A home automation system using the Arduino Uno and iOS mobile platform for remote control of power extension leads. * [ToDo++](https://github.com/RavenXce/ToDo_PlusPlus): A fast and powerful to-do manager for the desktop power-user. Done for the CS2103 Software Engineering module. ### Contact me at +65-92218698

ravenxce@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
